divs: sighting detailsi observed this thing move too fast to be a star i'm familiar with and a couple of other objects around it for two hours on the night of october 9th from about 2100 to 2300 hours. it appeared in the ne sky and appeared to transit about 25 degrees in the time we watched it. i was able to observe it on a meade 4504 telescope (thanks neil!) where i noted it rapidly leaving the field, and exhibiting blue yellow and red as well as white light blinking lights. i was observing saturn in my backyard when a very strong winking drew my attention to the ne to the direction of mt. wilson. the object was brighter then polaris, and too high in the sky to be a part of the mt. wilson communications suite. i grabbed a pair of 30x binoculars and could see that the object had discernible movement. i went inside and got my wife who also noted its strangeness and she got her camera while i went and got the telescope described above. i couldn't get over the impression it was a beacon. the next day i uploaded 2 short videos of the event to youtube and did a search to see if anyone else had observed a similar phenomenon on oct 9th and found over 20 examples from all over the world. the next day today october 11th i did another search and found over 40 examples from the night of the 10th. i collected what i did and posted two blogs with the compilation. *(link moved to additional evidence section below--cms\sg). for about the last 4 months i have felt different from my normally different self.
trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Pasadena
There were no other sightings in Pasadena on or around October 9th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
